page.description: Object to represent a file or memory stream for uploading or downloading content using the Curl class.

methodref.name: GetHeaders
methodref.description: Get headers (requires SetHeaderFlag called with true).

methodref.name: SetBinaryMode
methodref.description: Sets the binary mode (write binary data to the socket).

methodref.name: SetFilename
methodref.description: Sets filename, if this is a disk based file.

methodref.name: SetHeaderFlag
methodref.description: Sets the header flag (save headers for request).

methodref.name: TrackProgress
methodref.description: Use IO rather than curl to track progress.
